application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 13 (Landscaping Scheme) 14 (Refuse and Recycling) and 15 (Cycle Storage) of planning permission 20/01700/FUL (Erection of a two storey detached house and detached linked two storey annex with single storey detached garage (following demolition of existing house, garage, surrounding terraces and annex building))
decision_conditions: It would appear from the submitted final landscaping scheme that a large double door contractor access gate is proposed and which requires the removal of dense hedgerow. This would be visible from Warren Rise and Miramonteand would unacceptably impact the outlook of the immediate Coombe House Conservation area, as well as have an unacceptable impact on the green visual amenity through the removal of hedgerow.
